extendedInfo.description: "Beauty Camera" is designed to make your photo look more beautiful. When you take photos in dark room, the face or object will not lookas beautiful as usual. BeautyCamera helps solve the problem.You can not only adjust the brightness but also tonal and detail of the photo. With the app you can also smooth the skin, remove spot on the face.Features:- Take new photo or select photo in phone - Compare the effect with previous photo- Adjust brightness, tonal, smoothing and detal- Save new image - Share images with your friends via facebook, twitter, email etc

reviews.title: Best for smoothing skin complextion, simple to use, love the app!
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Sara Boc Vandenberg

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: User friendly and works great. Love it
reviews.author: Nicole Passante

reviews.title: Tinks for nuttin!
reviews.comment: I wanted a little glamour shot to end my mothers day. I wasnt expecting much, BUT DID YOU HAVE TO MAKE ME LOOK LIKE MEATLOAF IN FIGHTCLUB?! N BURNT INTO MY RETINAS IS MEATLOAFS HEAD. REALLY? I AINT LAUGHING. AND IF YOU WERE HERE, YOU WOULDNT BE EITHER. WHY NOT THE ELEPHANT MAN OR FLAV-O-FLAV?
reviews.author: marcey samson

reviews.title: Nice App !
reviews.comment: ...only thing is unlike the same App on the Apple iPhone\'s OS, this one App on Android\'s Devices brightens the image way too much, Needs a lil\' improving !  but I still use it frequently.... I do miss my Apple | iPhone- iOS vs The Androids - OS !
reviews.author: DAVID VOLTA

reviews.title: Need to improve
reviews.comment: Need to improve to get excellent ths time...as like others there is not a option to upload profile photo without cropping or zooming,un willingly we have to select only squared area ....
reviews.author: Vineet Dhankhar

reviews.title: 3 stars because....
reviews.comment: I love this app! Makes pics look so professional. Just didn\'t gave 5 stars because it doesn\'t to batches. Also you have to do all the steps for each picture you\'re taking. Wish it was automatic. :)
reviews.author: Renata Colares Barbato Diniz

reviews.title: Always too bright
reviews.comment: They always make the pictures waaay too bright and there\'s no way to change it. /:
reviews.author: dee machado

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Needs work on the tone, smoothing & detail.... Makes it look kinda...um cheesy.  5stars after fix.
reviews.author: christal brown

reviews.title: 5/9/13 update didn\'t fix problem
reviews.comment: After selecting a photo, it acts as if its scanning or loading ALL  pictures! Then it loads picture selected, after adjusting effect it acts as if its loading ALL pictures from the gallery AGAIN... Skin brightening is way too intense! Please fix! Would love this if it worked properly =/.
reviews.author: Sarha R

reviews.title: Ughh!
reviews.comment: Its okayy nd hella boring too soo! #uninstalling:/
reviews.author: Meka Jones

reviews.title: Poor!
reviews.comment: This app sucks, most say it works but really it doesnt!-_- Its not worth the download doesnt even do what the pictures do! You shouldnt download it people its so stupid & complicated , and it makes your pictures up side down :/

reviews.comment: Im enjoying it...it enhances pictures..thankyou

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Has to load every tiny change u make, so takes ages. U cant move up n down on brightess or anything n see the change happen straight away it loads each different slight change slowly .got bored waste of time

reviews.title: Fabulouse app
reviews.comment: Love it so much..its awesome

reviews.title: So So
reviews.comment: It does make skin tone look nice but the brightness is TOO MUCH! Pls fix that, the one on iOS is 100xs better. Really thinking of going back to my iPhone just BC the apps on here are so mediocre.

reviews.comment: It\'s okay, it makes your skin look flawless but downgrades your photos to a poor quality making them useless
